roadmap.title: My path to the digital.
roadmap.text: It all started with HTML 5 banners and a QR code generator. Since then, I've tried out a lot and learned a lot. Especially with YouTube tutorials, free code camp, practical work, Stackoverflow, Google and ChatGPT I was able to acquire a solid knowledge in the digital field. Below you can find some of the projects I created along the way.

projects.title: My Projects.
projects.text: Through practical work, I was able to acquire basic knowledge in the field of web development. They show my passion for developing applications as well as further developing my skills.

about_me.title: Hi, I'm Nick!
about_me.text: Ambitious, dedicated, interested and motivated to finally develop myself in the field I have put my hard work, dedication, heart, curiosity, skills and energy into. I am looking for a new challenge to develop and promote my self-taught skills in a professional environment. Unfortunately, I am not able to utilise this potential in my current agency, so I am looking for you!

intro.title: Hey, nice to meet you!
intro.text: Inspired by the possibilities that web development offers, I immediately realised after my apprenticeship that I didn't just want to work in print production. So I started self-studying to acquire the necessary skills. In order to be able to use them, I am looking for a company that will support me with its know-how and give me the opportunity to develop myself further.
intro.text_2: Find out more about me, my education, qualifications and professional activities here. I look forward to meeting you in person!

about.title: About me
about.info: I am 23 years old, have completed an apprenticeship as a Premedia Specialist and work as a print production manager at Havas Switzerland. Last year I was able to work for Havas Spain in Barcelona for 2 months and learn Spanish fluently during this time. Through self-study, I have acquired a basic knowledge of web development - especially HTML, CSS, Tailwind CSS, JavaScript as well as React - with several courses and would now like to continue my professional education in this area. Now I'm ready for the next stage and would be happy to meet you in person.
